Text:

it says i cant play cus i didnt buy the game

@killa4rilla 
You haven't patched it with the crack. 
Copy the ".exe" file from the crack folder over the top of the original one located in: 
C:\Program files\Telltale Games\Back to the Future The Game\Episode x\
This needs doing for each episode

-----------------------------------------------

These are SO good! What a great game series. 
Works fine. 
The only issue i noticed occurred on Windows 7 64-bit systems (two tested) and on them both the frame rate on the in-game movie scenes began skipping/stuttering badly. Both were high-end machines: a quad core and a triple core with 4GB ram each and N-Vidia Geforce graphics cards. 
On Windows 7 32-bit systems i tried they played out smoothly as anything (and these were much lower spec machines than the 64bit ones tested and with budget 3rd-party GeForce cards.) 

Fantastic game series. Thanks again, uploader.

I have a problem with the crack. It says :The program cant be started because  QtGui.dll is missing form your computer. Try reinstslling the program to fix the problem

What can i do?
mar6125... you have to copy over that exe file over to the game directory and copy & replace. QtGuii is in there

thanks for the game
